content.query:
use electric_vehicle_explorer;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'propietary.tsv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS propietary;
